name: BicepBuild
helpMarkDown: Runs the Bicep CLI build command
author: Raúl Piracés

inputs.name: process
inputs.label: Directory of files or single file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose between an input directory of .bicep files to process or a single file

inputs.name: sourceDirectory
inputs.label: Source Directory for .bicep file(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source directory for .bicep file(s) to compile

inputs.name: outputProcess
inputs.label: Output options for processed files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose between an output directory, and output file (only when processing a single file), or stdout for the output of the compilation

options.default: Default (same name and directory as input files)

inputs.name: stdout
inputs.label: Print the output to standard output (stdout)
inputs.helpMarkDown: To print the output to standard output (stdout) or not

inputs.name: outputDirectory
inputs.label: Output directory for .json generated file(s) by Bicep
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output directory for .json generated file(s) by Bicep (will have preference over 'filePath')

inputs.name: outputFile
inputs.label: Output filename for the .json generated file by Bicep
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output filename for the .json generated file by Bicep
